mapper.sql: select id, create_time, status, send, remark, order_no, dr, parent_order_id, member_no, order_username, user_id, date from t_order_info
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_time, a.status, a.send, a.remark, a.order_no, a.dr, a.parent_order_id, a.member_no, a.order_username, a.user_id, a.date, sum(b.cny_amount) cny_amount, sum(b.hk_amount) hk_amount from t_order_info a join t_order_product b on a.id = b.order_id join t_order_parent f on a.parent_order_id = f.id and (f.date >= #{startDate} and f.date <= #{endDate} ) join t_order_express e on a.id = e.order_id and (e.express_name like #{express} or e.express_phone like #{express} ) join t_order_user d on a.id = d.order_id and (d.user_name like #{orderUser} or d.user_no like #{orderUser} ) where 1 = 1 and (a.order_username like #{payUser} or a.order_phone like #{payUser} ) group by a.id order by a.id desc

select a.id, a.order_no,a.member_no, order_username, a.remark,case when sum(b.express_number) is null then '未发货' when sum(b.express_number) = 0 then '已发货' else '部分发货' end statusString from t_order_info a left join t_order_detail b on a.id = b.order_id and b.express_number != b.number where a.parent_order_id = #{parentOrderId} group by a.id order by a.id desc

select a.id, a.create_time, a.status, a.send, a.remark, a.order_no, a.dr, a.parent_order_id, a.member_no, a.order_username, a.user_id, a.date, sum(b.cny_amount) cny_amount, sum(b.hk_amount) hk_amount from t_order_info a join t_order_product b on a.id = b.order_id where a.user_id = #{userId} group by a.id order by a.id desc

select a.id, a.create_time, a.last_modified, a.status, a.send, a.remark, a.order_no, a.dr, a.parent_order_id, a.member_no, a.order_username, a.user_id, a.date, sum(b.score) score, sum(hk_amount) hk_amount, sum(cny_amount) cny_amount,c.name parentOrderName,c.date parentOrderDate from t_order_info a left join t_order_parent c on a.parent_order_id = c.id join t_order_product b on a.id = b.order_id where a.id = #{id} group by a.id
select a.order_no from t_order_info a join t_order_user b on a.id = b.order_id where b.user_id = -1 and a.parent_order_id = -1;
select a.date,sum(score) score,sum(hk_cost_amount) hk_cost_amount from t_order_info a join t_order_product b on a.id = b.order_id where a.parent_order_id = -1 group by a.date;

select a.id, a.create_time, a.status, a.send, a.remark, a.order_no, a.dr, a.parent_order_id, a.member_no, a.order_username, a.user_id, a.date, sum(b.cny_amount) cny_amount, sum(b.hk_amount) hk_amount from t_order_info a join t_order_product b on a.id = b.order_id where a.parent_order_id = #{parentOrderId} group by a.id order by a.id desc

update t_order_info set parent_order_id = #{orderParentId} where parent_order_id = -1
update t_order_info set order_no = #{orderNo} where id = #{id}
update t_order_info set send = #{send} where id = #{orderId}
